result.title: Invitation to the ACM-ICPC Kanpur onsite regionals 2014: Replay on CodeChef
result.content:
CodeChef invites all the programming enthusiasts to take part in the replay of ACM ICPC Kanpur onsite regionals 2014. The contest will have the problem set from the onsite round that determined the World Finalists to represent India from one of its three regional sites. You surely will enjoy cracking them.

It is an open contest and all you need is a CodeChef username to take part. If you do not have one, you may register here to participate.

Also, it is a team contest, so you need to register your teams first to take part in the contest. To register your team, register/login through CodeChef and go to: http://www.codechef.com/teams/register/KAN14ROS

Date of Contest: 2nd April 2015 Time: 19:00:00 hrs to 24:00:00 hrs IST Check out the local time in your City/Time Zone here.

We hope to see you all participating in the contest.

Good Luck!
